description: Shows the workspace settings in your subscription - these settings let you control which workspace will hold your security data.

commands.name: az security workspace-setting create
commands.summary: Creates a workspace settings in your subscription - these settings let you control which workspace will hold your security data.

commands.name: az security workspace-setting delete
commands.summary: Deletes the workspace settings in your subscription - this will make the security events on the subscription be reported to the default workspace.

commands.name: az security workspace-setting list
commands.summary: Shows the workspace settings in your subscription - these settings let you control which workspace will hold your security data.

commands.name: az security workspace-setting show
commands.summary: Shows the workspace settings in your subscription - these settings let you control which workspace will hold your security data.
